sentences.english: His voice was tense, a ripple of emotion flowing through it.
sentences.chinese: 他的声音是时态，一阵流动过它的情绪涟波。

sentences.english: This book includes a passage which deals with verb tenses.
sentences.chinese: 这本书包括涉及动词时态的一章。

sentences.english: He had been able to dance before the accident.
sentences.chinese: 事故前他能够跳舞，有时态的变化。

sentences.english: If you want to talk about work you did in the past, use the past tense, e.g.
sentences.chinese: 如果你想谈论你过去做什么工作，用过去时态。
使用正面的语气，现在时态。

sentences.english: The paratactic syntax and tense feature of Chinese ancient poetry can create a kind of "Dynamic Beauty".
sentences.chinese: 古汉诗的意合句法和时态特征创建了一种“动态美”。

sentences.english: Therefore grasps the words and expressions matching, thesentence pattern, the tense is very important.
sentences.chinese: 所以掌握词语的搭配，句型，时态很重要。

sentences.english: Third, note the context, it will give you hints to use a certain tense.
sentences.chinese: 第三，关注上下文，它可以给你某些特定时态的线索。

sentences.english: I really dislike doing grammar and tense related english fill-in questions.
sentences.chinese: 我很讨厌做关于语法和时态转换的英语填空题。

sentences.english: It inspects relations between the Marxist philosophy and the time.
sentences.chinese: 共时态地考察马克思主义哲学与时代之关系。

sentences.english: This column captures the timestamp when the row is deleted from the system-period temporal table.
sentences.chinese: 此列捕获从系统周期时态表中删除该行时的时间戳。

sentences.english: The verbs in each pattern can be changed to other tenses.
sentences.chinese: 而每个模板中的动词均可改变成其他时态。

sentences.english: Write in present tense and only what you can see and hear on the screen.
sentences.chinese: 使用现在时态，只描述你能够听到和看到的东西。

sentences.english: Simple past statements with regular and irregular verbs.
sentences.chinese: 过去时态的句子以及动词过去式规则与不规则变化。

sentences.english: The tense system is based on two basic principles.
sentences.chinese: 二是递归性，即时态在系统内可作重复选择。

sentences.english: I'll tell you more about the use of tenses in English later on.
sentences.chinese: 以后我会告诉你们更多关于英语时态的用法。

definition: part of speech (noun, verb, adjective etc)/lexical category
subject-verb-object SVO or subject-predicate-object sentence pattern (e.g. in Chinese grammar)
